titles: The raging Turke, or, Baiazet the Second A tragedie vvritten by Thomas Goffe, Master of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford, and acted by the students of the same house.
author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.
publisher: Printed by August. Matthevves, for Richard Meighen,
notes: Dedication heading, A2r, is in four lines. Variant: A2r is a paste-on cancel; text in same setting, but heading in six lines.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bayezid --  II, --  Sultan of the Turks, 1447 or 8-1512 --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
